title: FS: SGC graded Powers Hindu and Doyle Throwing Hindu - BOTH SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: SGC graded Powers Hindu and Doyle Throwing Hindu - BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
Letting a back run go. Have these available. Both super nice! Always good to get a 150-only off back…..always tough landing one.

Comment SOLD or shoot me a PM. Anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority over ongoing negotiations. 


$SOLD Powers SGC 5
$SOLD Doyle Throwing SGC 3 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2m5JKKH][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/51249435779_b71731b590_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2m5FTkN][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/51248875968_2fc59bf829_b.jpg[/img][/url]
Wow! Nice cards for anyone who gets them.
Congrats on sale. Nice Hindus getting tougher and tougher to find. These are great examples.

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=2114115]Congrats on sale. Nice Hindus getting tougher and tougher to find. These are great examples.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Mike. They really are nice to look at. Really enjoyed having them but time to move on to other things!
No doubt! I rotate things around often. Keeps collecting fresh and exciting. Congrats again.
